snippet.title: Towards a Perilous Journey - Chronicle 12 | Oculus Rift | HTC Vive | WMR
snippet.description:
Here is the chronicle 12 of Towards a Perilous Journey. Multi types of enemies, growing up difficulty. Accuracy, dodge and coordination will be the main ingredients to succeed this chronicle.

Steam Store: https://store.steampowered.com/app/852860/ads=yt
Itch.io Store: https://sparklygames.itch.io/towards-a-perilous-journey

Music : Caprisqui by Andre Jetson (CC BY)
https://andrejetson.bandcamp.com/track/caprisqui
